mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cave Spring Memorandums, September 1942
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1942 Cave Spring Mutual Aid Disagreement and Fire Station Proposal, written/typed up in September of 1942 between Salem Fire Department and the Roanoke County Board of Supervisors on deciding the location of a fire department for the Cave Spring district.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
